alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 12:45PM CDT until June 13 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CADDO AND WEST CENTRAL BOSSIER PARISHES...MARION... SOUTH CENTRAL CASS AND NORTHERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 1245 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Karnack, or 17 miles east of Marshall, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Marshall, Vivian, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Oil City, Mooringsport, Belcher, Gilliam, Lodi, Smithland, Berea, Harleton, Karnack, Woodlawn, Gray, Scottsville and Uncertain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
